segments.text: What a surprise meeting you here , Landy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m here as a tourist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a small world , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s a small world . We never know where we ’ ll meet someone we know .
segments.speaker: S2
